column1: Creative Graphic Designer-Static + Video (off Role) || Mumbai
column2: We are hiring for one of our client for the role of Creative Designer-Static + Video based out of Mumbai location. PFB the required details: Industry: Oil Refinery Payroll Company: Randstad India Location: Mumbai   Responsibilities for In-house Graphic Designer. Creative Conceptualiser  Able to translate briefs to creative brand solutions. Oversee and take ownership of all design projects, from conception to delivery Develop designs for Retail marketing campaigns including toolkits for Local Store Marketing, Eventising Retail Days etc. across multiple media platforms including web , whatsapp and social media Adept in technical  production details including Videos/ Static across Print and digital mediums. Your skills and visual acumen will be at the heart of our creative output, so you must be aware of new and innovative design ideas. Create new concepts and artwork design for all collaterals to be used externally and internally, across all channels Work on key business strategic transformation projects including logos etc. Be a brand ambassador by owning brand guidelines, ensuring brand standardisation ?and supporting others in understanding and implementing these guidelines Develop brand editorial design language, utilizing style guides to ensure consistency of brand identity and core values. Ability to multi  task: Work across multiple project deadlines What you will need: Proactive presentation to pitch new ideas/ clarity in articulation to link creative solutions to business challenges. Strong knowledge of design process and project management Proven ability to produce cutting edge creative work, and a passion for and understanding of design, including typography and layout Strong experience with Corel Draw, Adobe Illustration, Aftereffects, Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Canva and other video-based software. 3D Autocad will be a bonus. Experience in creating visual designs-AV content for websites and social platforms Interested candidates may share their CV at: anisha.rana@randstad.in OR WhatsApp: 7973641471

column2: Project Management:  Lead and manage motion graphics projects from concept to completion, including planning, scheduling, budgeting, and resource allocation. Creative Direction:  Provide creative direction and guidance to the motion graphics team, ensuring that designs align with the project objectives, client briefs, and brand guidelines. Team Leadership:  Supervise and mentor a team of motion graphics artists, providing feedback, support, and professional development opportunities to foster their growth and maximize their performance. Quality Assurance:  Ensure the quality and consistency of motion graphics deliverables by reviewing work-in-progress and final outputs, providing constructive feedback, and implementing revisions as needed. Technical Expertise:  Possess a deep understanding of motion graphics software and tools such as Adobe After Effects, Cinema 4D, or similar platforms, as well as proficiency in compositing, animation, typography, and visual effects techniques. Collaboration:  Collaborate closely with other departments, including creative directors, producers, designers, and clients, to align motion graphics projects with overall project goals and ensure seamless integration with other elements of the production. Problem-Solving:  Troubleshoot technical issues and creative challenges as they arise, proactively identifying solutions and alternatives to keep projects on track and within scope. Stay Updated:  Keep abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in motion graphics design and animation, incorporating new techniques and tools to enhance project outcomes and maintain a competitive edge.

column2: Key Responsibilities:   Graphic Design: Conceptualise and design various marketing materials, including but not limited to banners, brochures, social media posts, and other promotional materials. Develop and maintain the visual identity of the brand across all platforms. Collaborate with the marketing team to create compelling designs that support marketing campaigns.   Video Editing: Edit and assemble raw footage to create engaging and visually appealing videos. Add effects, graphics, and animations to enhance video content. Ensure the final product aligns with the brand guidelines and effectively conveys the intended message.   Creative Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, content creation, and product development, to understand project requirements and deliver visually stunning designs and videos. Participate in brainstorming sessions to contribute creative ideas and concepts.   Software Proficiency: Proficient in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.). Stay updated on industry trends and new tools to enhance design and editing capabilities.   Quality Control: Ensure all designs and videos meet the highest quality standards and are error-free before final production. Review and provide feedback on the work of peers to maintain consistency and excellence in design.   Project Management: Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring deadlines are met without compromising quality. Communicate effectively with team members to keep everyone informed of project status.   Skills: Proficient      in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and video      editing software. Strong      understanding of design principles, colour theory, and typography. Excellent      communication and collaboration skills. Ability      to work in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines.

column2: Williams Lea is hiring Graphic designer who will have to work from Client office Client  - JP Morgan Chase Payroll - Williams Lea   Job Description Job duties (* denotes an essential function??  *Conceptualize and produce online and offline collateral for marketing and sales, including original campaigns, direct mail, brochures, print and banner ads, product sheets, PowerPoint presentations and more.  *Work closely with clients and/or project management teams to understand the client?? business needs.  *Formulate forward-thinking concepts and render designs for multimedia campaigns while always elevating our client?? brand  *Responsible for the design and production of a diverse range of graphic, print, and digital media collateral to support client needs.   *Develop comprehensive multimedia campaigns.  Identify fresh and innovative design solutions that push the boundaries of the client brand and explore more effective formats and/or media channels.  *Understand the restrictions and limitations of the designs deliverable process and manage client expectations (where appropriate) through providing education in relation to design limitation and/or restrictions  Responsible for ensuring brand consistency while offering a fresh approach to design, artwork, digital and print output.  Provide effective visual solutions by executing client creative requests and creative projects.  Ensure that all work is visually appealing and created to specification  Ensure that all work produced is to a suitably high standard and within brand guidelines and specifications. Additional Job Description Job qualifications  Bachelor?? degree in digital arts/graphic design (or other related field) or equivalent years of experience  2-4 years of relevant work experience in the graphic design industry  Excellent design knowledge and application.  Exceptional visual trouble shooting skills.  Ability to storyboard, comp visual ideas within the creative process.  Conceptual creative and production skills with a good understanding of layout principles, aesthetic design concepts and typography.  Experience creating campaigns and extending the look and feel through various marketing materials.  Able to complete tasks within tight schedules and under strict layout controls.  Strong verbal communication skills; dependable, detail-oriented, and well organized.   Strong presentation skills.  Proven skills in the latest Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign, Photoshop, Illustrator) and Microsoft Office, including Power Point  Web design experience is a plus.  Experience working in both in an agency and/or corporate environment preferred.  Motivated, organized, and flexible.

column1: Senior Visualizer - 3D - B2B Events Agency - Bengaluru
column2: Job Title: Senior Visualizer- 3D Location: Bengaluru Experience Level: 6-7 years Job Type: Full-Time - Work-from-office ( 5 days a week) Reports to: ACD/Creative Director Job Description: The Senior Visualizer will be responsible for conceiving unique and original design & model concepts as per briefs shared. They should visualize and create the ideas set forth during the creative brainstorming phase and ensure high-quality creative and design output. Key Responsibilities: Create 3D layout of event venue (Interior & Exterior) and set elements. Understand and use software like 3D Max effectively. Program lights & camera from a realistic & photographic angle. Read & understand CAD files & figures. Enhance images with special effects. Model and convert data sets from CAD or other 3D modelling packages. Create designs basis production material available. Qualifications: Must hold a Bachelors Degree. Post-graduation is not necessary. Certificate Course in 3D required. 3 - 6 years of relevant experience in an event management company is essential. Skills Required: Proficient in applications like 3Ds Max. Ability to create models from architectural plans, sketches, and elevations. Photorealistic rendering technique. Advanced presentation and layout skills. Ability to work under pressure to meet deadlines. Knowledge of soft skills for lighting, camera angles & line of sight. Preferred understanding & usage of CAD, Photoshop, CorelDraw, Autodesk Maya, Eyeon Fusion, Keyshot, Mudbox etc. If you wish you apply for the role, please share a copy of your resume and portfolio with pujasnavin@hr-central.in with the following details: 1. Total Years of experience 2. Experience in 3Ds Max 3. Experience in a Events Company 4. Current CTC 5. Expected CTC 6. Notice Period regards, Puja S Navin HR Central

column2: Responsibilities          Ability to create brilliant visual designs.             Identify themes and trends in the visual design space and recommend changes.             You will be responsible for the entire UX lifecycle of one or more projects, including gathering requirements, defining user stories, creating UX prototypes and wireframes, coordinating their implementation and integration, writing interface text, usability testing (pre and post development) and more.             You will be expected to research and apply user-centered design processes to create high quality user experiences, and reusable mocks and wireframe templates for various websites.             You have mastered the art of information architecture and usability engineering and can always come up with a structured, logical, intuitive, simple and clean way of translating user stories into the text, screens and flows.             Your oral and written communication and articulation skills are immaculate and you can always come up with the perfect text for any given interface.             You understand the nuances of integrating user interfaces into code. You also keep in touch with technology advancements and understand the impact of new standards on product design. (for e.g. HTML 5.0 etc)       Who should apply:         You have a Bachelor's or associate degree in graphic design / UX and / or have formal training in these technologies.             You have a solid understanding of Photoshop and HTML 5. Additional knowledge of CSS and action scripts etc would be a plus.             You are passionate about design and produce path breaking design ideas.             You are an Idea powerhouse.             Pro-activeness in presenting or 'pitching' new ideas and designs.             Good communication skills.             Out of the box thinking.             Excellent attention to detail.             Strong knowledge of color theory.             Thorough knowledge of Web (W3C) standards.
